DOC.brief_summary: This study test investigational drug , theophylline , child pseudohypoparathyroidism type 1a ( PHP1a ) . This study involve 3 day visit Vanderbilt Clinical Research Center .
DOC.brief_title: Theophylline Treatment Children With Pseudohypoparathyroidism Type 1a ( Albright Hereditary Osteodystrophy )
DOC.detailed_description: Study measure do baseline 24h infusion IV theophylline . Theophylline level draw ensure therapeutic dose monitor toxicity . Measures include laboratory value , response PTH infusion rest energy expenditure .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 10 21 year old 2 . English proficiency 3 . Clinical genetic diagnosis PHP1a 1 . Use PDE inhibitor past 30 day 2 . History seizure disorder unrelated hypocalcemia 3 . History cardiac arrhythmia ( include bradycardia ) 4 . History hepatic insufficiency 5 . AST ALT > 2x upper limit normal 6 . Total bilirubin > 1.5 x upper limit normal ( unless patient diagnosis Gilbert 's syndrome cause lead hyperbilirubinemia identify ) 7 . Congestive heart failure 8 . Cigarette use past 30 day 9 . Alcohol use within past 24 hour 10 . Current pregnancy 11 . Untreated hypothyroidism ( define free T4 level < 0.6 ng/dL TSH > 10 mcU/mL ) 12 . Active peptic ulcer disease 13 . Fever > 101 degree past 24 hour 14 . Current use medication know effect theophylline level ( list ) 15 . Severe sleep apnea require BiPAP Drugs clinically significant drug interaction theophylline : Allopurinol Cimetidine Ciprofloxacin Clarithromycin Enoxacin Ephedrine Erythromycin Estrogen Flurazepam Fluvoxamine Lithium Lorazepam Methotrexate Midazolam Pentoxifylline Propranolol Rifampin Sulfinpyrazone Tacrine Thiabendazole Ticlopidine Troleandomycin Verapamil
